about_the_game:
History

Alice is a 19 year old female student. Studied at the Faculty of Journalism. And she needs your help in finding the right book to write a report on one of the subjects.

Gameplay

Hentai Student is a trivial visual novel and casual puzzle game with a beautiful girl.

Pass levels, open new scenes, go through the story.

In each new scene, the appearance of the girl will change to an increasingly erotic one and new details of the story will be revealed.

Levels can include quests such as clicker, puzzles or tetris.

Features

Card Collection

Beautiful Images

content_descriptors.notes:
There are sexual acts, naked bodies of people.

Sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse or self-harm - None.
